content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is new and has an area of 50 square meters. It is also unfurnished and located in the city center. This is a great place, so I am willing to start the price at €1,000 per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident that I can get more for my apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand. How about €950 per month? This is a good price for an apartment in the city center.
